overview: The Photographic Experience, a short film by Anthony Bvlgari, follows Tony, an environmental photographer of the 1970s as his newly acquired camera reveals its photographic history to him. Photographic Experience is made as a moving artwork in mind, stylistically exploring popular film styles and genres of the 1970s, 1960s, 1950s, 1940s, and 1930s.
tagline: Tony, an environmental photographer of the 1970s, acquires an old camera whichÂ reveals its photographic history to him
title: The Photographic Experience
